abstract: French authorities hold unidentified 24-year-old Algerian student in Paris on suspicions of planning imminent terror attack on at least one church; police say suspect had documents and devices indicating a connection with someone in Syria who was providing guidance on carrying out an attack.
lead_paragraph: The unidentified 24-year-old, who is also accused of being involved in the killing of a woman, is suspected of targeting at least one church.

headline.main: Student Arrested on Suspicion of Planning Attack in France

snippet: The unidentified 24-year-old, who is also accused of being involved in the killing of a woman, is suspected of targeting at least one church.
